content.rendered:
Business Intelligence

Nutzung Von Daten Zur Transformation Ihres Unternehmens.

Als Beratungsunternehmen für Daten und Analysen unterstützen wir Unternehmen dabei, ihre Daten in aussagekräftige und umsetzbare Informationen umzuwandeln. Bei Pharaoh Soft unterstützt Sie unser Team für Business-Intelligence-Lösungen dabei, Ihre Daten zu verstehen und sie zur Lösung komplexer geschäftlicher Herausforderungen zu nutzen, von der Datenstrategie bis zur Ausführung.

Dienstleistungen

Wir helfen Ihnen dabei, Ihre Projektlogistik zu vereinfachen, Kosten zu senken, den ROI zu erhöhen und die Effizienz zu verbessern, indem wir mit unserem ergebnisorientierten Entwicklungsteam zusammenarbeiten. Wir sind Ihre Anlaufstelle für alle Ihre Qlik-Projektanforderungen. Da wir aus der Ferne arbeiten, sind wir nicht von Reiseverspätungen, komplizierten Flugrouten oder Verkehrsstaus betroffen. Sie sparen Geld für die Reisekosten Ihrer Berater und wir sind immer erreichbar, wenn Sie uns brauchen.

Data And Analytics Strategy

We’ll help you develop an actionable data and analytics strategy that outlines the people, processes, and technology you need to get the most value out of your data. We don’t take a cookie cutter approach. Using our exclusive methodology, your playbook will include tailored strategies that support your business goals and set you up for long-term success.

Enterprise Data Arch

Cloud-based, on-premises, and hybrid–we build secure and flexible data architectures to serve as the foundation for data and analytics. We ensure the architecture promotes the use of high quality, relevant, and usable data and is built to effortlessly grow along with your business.

Data Modernization

We’ll help move you away from legacy solutions that inhibit innovation to modernized solutions that allow you keep up with your growing business demands. We also help ensure you are maximizing your modern technologies to their fullest potential.

Cloud Migration & Deployment

We’ll help you select technology, address security concerns, and identify resources required for your cloud implementation. When you’re ready to migrate your data and analytics, deploy an entire solution, or build a cloud infrastructure, our expertise will minimize the risk of disrupting your business operations.

Data Visual

Our consultants will make sure you have the right tools and know-how to make it as easy as possible to navigate your data. We have partnerships and work with core BI technologies to help our clients organize, improve, and communicate data to make better business decisions.

Data Analytics

pharaoh soft has a long, successful history with data management and BI software and strong relationships with vendors in the industry – old, new, mainstream, and niche. As a tool agnostic organization, our consultants are highly trained to help review, select, and implement the best technology to meet your needs.

Anaytics & BI

Whether your analytics solution needs some fine tuning, you want to migrate to a new tool, or you are just starting your analytics journey, we will help you optimize and deploy an enterprise-wide business intelligence platform.

Data Integration

We use modern data integration technology and techniques to clean and transform all of your data across the enterprise, regardless of form or function, in a single trusted location for unified analysis. Our integration processes can be replicated, interrupted, iterated on, and easily understood.

Training

We offer a range of training services to bolster your team’s knowledge so you can increase productivity, decrease maintenance costs, and improve technology adoption rates. Software, data modeling, dashboard design, strategy, and more – our training will enable your team to do more with data.
